subject: Re: [junit] Re: Literate assertions
msgSnippet: Charlie, Good to hear about the NUnitLite project.  I m glad to hear of a project who s primary selling point is fewer features--someone has to be bold enough
messageBody:
Charlie,

Good to hear about the NUnitLite project. I'm glad to hear of a
project who's primary selling point is fewer features--someone has to
be bold enough to do it. :-)

On 11/30/06, Charlie Poole <charlie@...> wrote:
> Assert.That( arrayOfDoubles, Is.All.GreaterThan( 0.0 ) );

Nice. Almost feels like XQuery, somehow (I mean that in a good way,
although I don't always). Thanks,

David
